transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hello. Ji, madam. Hello. Haan, sir, aap Ratnakar ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Ji, boliye.
Executive: Haan, sir, main Payal baat kar rahi hoon IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Sir, kal hamari video meeting hui thi, toh aap matlab aapko sab kuch clear tha jab main customer care pe call kiya? Kya baat hai?
Customer: Customer care pe phone Yes, sir. kiya tha?
Executive: Sir, aapne customer care pe call kiya hai?
Customer: Kal ya aaj?
Executive: Sir, aaj.
Customer: Kaunse number se aaya hai?
Executive: Sir, 9696 pe kiya hoga aapne call maybe.
Customer: Achha, kya complaint hai? Sir, aapko video, sir, aapko video meeting chahiye kya ek baar dobara se?
Customer: Hmm, nahi main toh main puchta hoon kisne phone kiya hoga.
Executive: Achha, sir, aapko video meeting ki need nahi hai na waise abhi?
Customer: Ek baar aur samjha denge toh rahega, achha rahega.
Executive: Achha, sir, theek hai, phir main na ek, hmm. Haan, sir, main aapke saath video meeting phir ek baar dobara schedule kar lungi. Sir, aapke paas hai na ek mail aayega mere feedback ke regarding, matlab mere bhi yahi the dhyan, toh aap usko yes mark kar dena.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Haan, sir, aur hai na mera ye jo number hai na 84330 wala, aap isse mere naam se save kar lijiye. Aapko koi bhi doubt ho, query ho, toh aap mujhe connect kar sakte hain. Is is number pe na?
Customer: Haan, sir, 8433085380.
Executive: Ek minute, number. Haan, sir, right. Haan, sir, kar lijiye.
Customer: Ye number kya hai?
Executive: Sir, 84
Customer: 84
Executive: 330
Customer: Double
Executive: 330
Customer: 330
Executive: 85
Customer: 85
Executive: 380
Customer: 380. Yes, sir. Sir, Payal Goyal ke naam se save kar lijiye. Main aapke account mein aapko koi bhi doubt ho toh aap mujhe connect kar sakte hain. Dobara se number repeat kar dijiye, theek hai.
Executive: Haan, sir, main schedule kar le rahi hoon. Sir, aapke paas ek mail aayega, aap usko yes mark kar dijiye mere feedback ke regarding.
Customer: Okay, okay, okay.
Executive: Okay, sir, okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer inquired about the reason for the call.

- Customer requested another video meeting.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed scheduling another video meeting.

- Executive provided her contact number for future queries.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a feedback mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, feedback, contact number
